item.title: Setup Samba Share
item.content:encoded:
<!--more-->
## Setup Samba Share:
```bash apt update && apt install samba -y vi /etc/samba/smb.conf ```
Add this at the end of the config: ``` [media] path = /var/lib/vz/storage1 browseable = yes writable = yes guest ok = no read only = no create mask = 0775 directory mask = 0775 valid users = root ```
Setup a secure password ```bash smbpasswd -a root ```
Add Samba Share Storage to your PC as a network attached storage (local): ```bash gio mount smb://root@<proxmox-ip>/storage1 ```
